Presented at Oak Hills Church in San Antonio, Texas, on May 11, 2016.

videos.description: A short look back at the main takeaway of our 2014 VBVMI Bible conference on the Last Days: studying the end times is a source of comfort for the Christian.
videos.title: 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference Recap

videos.description: The 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference Main Session for Pastor Stephen Armstrong, who explains the Biblical imperative to study the end times.
videos.title: Why We Study the End Time - Stephen Armstrong

videos.description: The first breakout session of Stephen Armstrong from the 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference. Pastor Armstrong discusses all that the Bible can tell us on the coming world leader called the Antichrist.
videos.title: Who is the Antichrist? – Stephen Armstrong

videos.description: The second breakout session of Stephen Armstrong from the 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference. Pastor Armstrong teaches on the coming apostasy of the church described in the New Testament letters and in the book of Revelation.
videos.title: The Great Apostasy – Stephen Armstrong

videos.description: The 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference Main Session for Pastor Jim Bryant, explaining the meaning of Paul's statement in Romans 11 that the Church awaits the fullness of the Gentiles.
videos.title: Understanding the Fullness of the Gentiles - Jim Bryant

videos.description: The first breakout session of Jim Bryant from the 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference. Pastor Bryant explain the differences between Covenant and Dispensational Theology and shows from scripture the correct framework for understanding end times teaching.
videos.title: Knowing the Correct End Times Interpretation – Jim Bryant

videos.description: The second breakout session presentation by Pastor Jim Bryant at the 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference in San Antonio, Texas. Pastor Bryant explains the importance of a Christian living with an appreciation for the coming Rapture.
videos.title: Living in Anticipation of the Rapture - Jim Bryant

videos.description: The 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference Main Session for Dr. Thomas Ice, who explains the ongoing and increasing persecution of Israel from Revelation 13.
videos.title: The New Antisemitism – Thomas Ice

videos.description: The first breakout session of Dr. Thomas Ice from the 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference. Dr. Ice explains Daniel's 70th Week from Daniel 9.
videos.title: Daniel's 70th Week - Dr. Thomas Ice

videos.description: The second breakout session of Dr. Thomas Ice from the 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference. Dr. Ice explains from scripture how the Rapture and the Second Coming of Christ differ.
videos.title: Differences Between the Rapture and Second Coming - Dr. Thomas Ice

videos.description: Watch Dr. Thomas Ice, Pastor Jim Bryant, and Stephen Armstrong answer questions from conference participants. The Q&A session is moderated by Jerry Dyke of VBVMI.
videos.title: Speakers Q&A Session - 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference

videos.description: The 2015 VBVMI Bible Conference has come and gone. Now hear what some of those who attended thought of the event. Thanks to everyone who made this event a success.
videos.title: 2015 VBVMI Bible Conference Recap

videos.description: Pastor Stephen Armstrong teaches from 2Timothy 2 on what motivates Paul and all disciples to serve Christ faithfully. This is the first of four main sessions from the 2015 VBVMI Bible Conference held in San Antonio, Texas on October 8-10.
videos.title: Soldier, Athlete, Farmer: The Rewards of Discipleship - Stephen Armstrong

videos.description: Pastor Stephen Armstrong teaches his first breakout session at the 2015 VBVMI Bible Conference in San Antonio, Texas, on October 8-10.
videos.title: Future Trends in Discipleship – Stephen Armstrong

videos.description: The second breakout session from Pastor Stephen Armstrong at the 2105 VBVMI Bible Conference in San Antonio, Texas, on October 8-10.
videos.title: Small Group Discipleship – Stephen Armstrong

videos.description: Answering the Bible's call for all believer's to live as ambassadors for Christ in our temporary dwelling. A teaching from 2Corinthians 5 presented at the 2016 VBVMI Bible Conference held in San Antonio, Texas, on October 14-15, 2016.
videos.title: Stephen Armstrong's Main Session: Ambassadors for Christ

videos.description: Learn how to make your personal testimony an effective tool for evangelism. Teaching from the 2016 VBVMI Bible Conference held in San Antonio, Texas, on October 14-15, 2016.
videos.title: Stephen Armstrong's Breakout Session 'A' - An Effective Testimony

videos.description: Reaching the world for Christ requires the right tool for the right situation. Learn 4 common ways to present the Gospel. Teaching from the 2016 VBVMI Bible Conference held in San Antonio, Texas, on October 14-15, 2016.
videos.title: Stephen Armstrong's Breakout Session 'B' - Evangelist's Toolbox

videos.description: A teaching from John 5 on how the Lord enables the believer to succeed in presenting the Gospel even in the face of opposition. A teaching presented at the 2016 VBVMI Bible Conference held in San Antonio, Texas, on October 14-15, 2016.
videos.title: Joshua de Koning's Main Session: I Am With You: Christ Protects and Empowers Evangelism

videos.description: The proper perspective when persecution comes to the church. Teaching from the 2016 VBVMI Bible Conference held in San Antonio, Texas, on October 14-15, 2016.
videos.title: Joshua de Koning's Breakout Session 'A' - Attitude Check

videos.description: The best way to reach someone with the Gospel takes an investment of time. Teaching from the 2016 VBVMI Bible Conference held in San Antonio, Texas, on October 14-15, 2016.
videos.title: Joshua de Koning's Breakout Session 'B' - The Slow Way is the Fast Way

videos.description: A teaching from Luke 16 on how becoming like the "father" souts the purpose of bringing the world to know the Gospel. A teaching presented at the 2016 VBVMI Bible Conference held in San Antonio, Texas, on October 14-15, 2016.
videos.title: Royce Smith's Main Session: The Prodigal Son: Becoming an Ambassador Through Christ-likeness

videos.description: Royce Smith explains how to approach everyday moments with a mission-mindedness. Teaching from the 2016 VBVMI Bible Conference held in San Antonio, Texas, on October 14-15, 2016.
videos.title: Royce Smith's Breakout Session 'A' - Turning Everyday Conversations Into Gospel Presentations

videos.description: Royce Smith explains how to live in a cross cultural way to draw people into a conversation about Jesus. Teaching from the 2016 VBVMI Bible Conference held in San Antonio, Texas, on October 14-15, 2016.
videos.title: Royce Smith's Breakout Session 'B' - Six Ways to Attract the Lost

videos.description: The Biblical method of evangelism that Jesus taught from Luke 10. A teaching presented at the 2016 VBVMI Bible Conference held in San Antonio, Texas, on October 14-15, 2016.
videos.title: Main Session: Finding a Person of Peace

videos.description: Teaching from the 2016 VBVMI Bible Conference held in San Antonio, Texas, on October 14-15, 2016.
videos.title: Persecution: When It Starts and When It Stops

videos.description: The five speakers from the 2016 conference join together to discuss the conference topic and other matters. A presentation of the 2016 VBVMI Bible Conference held in San Antonio, Texas, on October 14-15, 2016.
videos.title: Panel Discussion with 2016 VBVMI Bible Conference Speakers

videos.description: Teaching from the 2016 VBVMI Bible Conference held in San Antonio, Texas, on October 14-15, 2016.
videos.title: Keith Walker's Breakout Session 'A' - What Do I Do With Jehovah's Witnesses at My Door?
